content.question: What is unique about the Sano Festival?

choices.label: It has the largest number of daruma figurines in Japan.
A daruma float is carried by twenty people.
It attracts more than ten thousand people each year.
The daruma figurines on display are various colors.

content.answer: The daruma figurines on display are various colors.
